item.title: Database - SQL Data Manipulation
item.description: Table of Contents Data Manipulation INSERT INTO Statement DELETE FROM Statement DELETE FROM and DROP TABLE Statements UPDATE Statement Data Manipulation So we have created a set of tables. However: How do we actually put data in our database? How do we modify data that is already in our database? How do we answer questions (queries) using our database data? Key Data Manipulation SQL commands: INSERT INTO - Creates new tuple(s) in a table.
